metadata.description: Getting help while grocery shopping for third-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何在超市购物时寻求帮助。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Excuse me, where are the apples?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Excuse me, where are the apples?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Asking politely gets great help!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Could you help me find the bread, please?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Could you help me find the bread, please?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! You're becoming independent in Ireland!
